_header: I met with Our Lady in a green way
_description: Sorrows of the Virgin Mary — one stanza (aabbccdd) of 8 irregular lines

BodArchGg39.Transcription:
I mett with owr lady in A Greene waywith A stocke and A locke I
                    sayshee sighed full soare for the deare soundwhech was nayled through
                    handeand feete to his brayne panneWell is the man that his creede
                    cannehis fellowe to teacheto heauen he shall reache
BodArchGg39.Note: Second parchment leaf, unnumbered, before f. 1.
